data.content:
noun
[noncount] a long journey or distance
Driving across the country would be a long haul.
chiefly US :a long period of time - usually used in the phrases for the long haul and over the long haul
It's going to be a tough project but we're in it for the long haul. [=we are prepared to work on the project until it is completed]
Will the company be able to succeed over the long haul?
